en.tippy_export: Back up your list or share it with your friends❤️
en.tippy_import: Import will add only those that do not exist in the list
en.mounted:
VRChat limitless avatar favorites
plugin loaded
en.tippy_transmit:
Transfer to native Favorites first order 
 Then click in the game to switch now 
  (Recently, the refresh time of the game’s Favorites has been reduced to once every 3~5 minutes.)
en.tippy_use:
Switch now! 
 but you need to switch the world to display correctly in the game 
 (Recently, the game has also updated some display bugs.)
en.avatars_full:
You already have 50 favorite avatars in native Favorites.
Please leave some space first.
en.avatars_added: You already have that avatar favorited
en.operation_failed:
Operation failed.
You can try to refresh the page and try again

zh_cn.tippy_export: 备份列表或者与您的好友分享
zh_cn.tippy_import: 导入会仅把列表中不存在的添加进来
zh_cn.mounted:
VRChat无限模型收藏夹
插件已加载
zh_cn.tippy_transmit:
传送到游戏内收藏夹第一顺位 
 然后在游戏中点击以立刻切换 
 (最近游戏内收藏夹刷新降到了3~5分钟一次)
zh_cn.tippy_use:
马上切换！ 
 但你需要切换世界才能在游戏中正确显示 
 (最近游戏也更新了无法正确显示的问题)
zh_cn.tippy_collect: 在无限收藏夹内添加/删除
zh_cn.avatars_full:
系统收藏夹已满
请先留出一些空位
zh_cn.operation_failed:
操作失败.
请尝试刷新页面后重试
